level.heading: PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER (ยง 19-108)

level.text: 108.1 The President and Chief Executive Officer shall have the duties describedn the Act and such other duties as may be authorized by the Board for theffective and efficient management of the Authority.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3816, 3821 (June 12, 1998); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10919, 10924 (November 19,010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8953 (June 14, 2013).
